website_summaries.verdict: The Nexus 9 is a well-built Android tablet with a powerful processor, and it'll always be the first to get the latest Google OS updates.
pros: First tablet with Android Lollipop, which has lots of new features
cons: Some apps need to be updated
Android is still a bit behind Windows on productivity apps and iOS on high-profile games and apps

customer_reviews.title: Don't update it!
customer_reviews.text: Was wonderful until an update a couple of months ago now crashes frequently and screen flickering awful!
customer_reviews.author: purple star

customer_reviews.title: Slowing down
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for over a year now and it has been great, but there are so many updates now it is starting to slow down. I have done all the maintenance etc. But to no avail seems like I have to buy a new one every 18 months.
customer_reviews.author: Wilsonkj

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was my tablet for years. I had no issues and it's a great piece of tech. Outdated now, but I'd still recommend it. Played all my games and videos smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Brynn McCullagh

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very fast and responsive tablet with a great high resolution screen. This is Google's first 4:3 ratio screen and it works a lot better than the 16:9 designs of the Nexus 7 and Nexus 10 - much better for web page viewing and expands nicely when rotated for watching TV and films. The build quality from HTC is solid and it feels like a high-end device (as it should for the price!). The update to Android 5.01 has sorted the initial hiccups with Lollipop and it's now slick and smooth in transitions.
customer_reviews.author: RobM

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend for a simple usage such as browsing or youtubing
customer_reviews.text: Offered to my wife as a Xmas gift. Used extensively for 2 weeks. Not even comparable to our old iPad2 in terms of speed and quality definition. The move from iOS to Android was seamless. Would highly recommend for a simple usage such as browsing or youtubing.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: ... contact Singapore suprise suprise nothing to do with them great service from both seller and great service not
customer_reviews.text: Brought in April and gone wrong buy July tryed contacting seller but nothing to do with them contact htc in uk or again nothing to do its them contact Singapore suprise suprise nothing to do with them great service from both seller and great service not , also great service from htc not again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed !
customer_reviews.text: Pretty Powerful tool, sketch, design, gaming 1. Great performance 2. Sound quality by HTC sounds big! 3 slim design 4. Light weight 5. Bright screen 6. Good battery life 7. Updated frequently
customer_reviews.author: Artur22

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the tablet as Christmas gift to my son. The price is slightly on the high side but from other hand my son is really happy with this product. Note he is using it to watch movies, to take notes during his lessons, to surf on internet, to play games from time to time. So far he likes it a lot and has no complaints about it.
customer_reviews.author: Desislava Peneva

customer_reviews.title: Superb!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say... I've had the smaller Nexus for a couple of years now and absolutely love it and thought it was about time I "upgraded" and wow - this is even better! It does everything its smaller cousin does but bigger and a lot faster. Can't really fault it!
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Barbar

customer_reviews.title: It runs smoothly and it is very user friendly. ...
customer_reviews.text: It runs smoothly and it is very user friendly. However don't buy it if you don't have private wi-fi because it cannot connect in public wi-fi or wi-fi that require registration when it makes the initial setup. Also you are unable to skip the setup, where it downloads the new update. My tablet was stuck in setup screen for a day before I found a free wi-fi to use in order to download the update. In addition, when I opened it, it constantly downloaded new updates, it must have been 5-7 updates one after another (each of them required system reboot).
customer_reviews.author: Stefi

customer_reviews.title: Clean lean android
customer_reviews.text: As with others, I read some negative reviews about this tablet, but I have to say its fine. Its good quality, feels sturdy and the screen is nice and bright and of a higher definition than my eyes can pick faults with. And of course the star of the show is clean lean android. After all that's why we buy nexus gear and its so refreshing to not have to deal with all that bloatware.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jones

customer_reviews.title: Hit and miss
customer_reviews.text: Great when they work, but overall build quality not good enough for price paid, sent two back before I not usable model , in fairness Amazon were great with the returns
customer_reviews.author: Damien

customer_reviews.title: Lovely tablet with heating issue
customer_reviews.text: The product it self is great and I'm satisfied with the design quality. I've considered different tablets, but decided to go with this one, knowing his flaws. Flaw that bothers me the most is that it gets really hot while browsing the web or playing a game. I fear constant heating could have impact on the CPU life or product life overall.
customer_reviews.author: Damjan Oreskovic

customer_reviews.title: If you want to enjoy android in its pure get it.
customer_reviews.text: Back light bleed and buttons are issues that this tablet has but not huge the tablet is good built quality if you keep the screen brightness at about 50% you will be OK I keep it at 30% and it is still bright and no light bleed at 30%.
customer_reviews.author: Asim Shahzad

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Bought this about 6 months ago and I spent a good amount of time looking for a tablet, and on paper this is meant to be one of the best tablets you can get, If you don't mind spending an extra £100 but it's worth the extra quid. After using it for a while I haven't had any problems at all, runs really smooth, does get a little bit hot if you use it excessively. I have no cons really for this tablet I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Love the tablet beautiful hardware mixed with flagship software
customer_reviews.text: Love the tablet beautiful hardware mixed with flagship software. Perfect size and weight when considering usability and portability (for me at least ...I've had bigger and smaller!) Great price, given the above, and speedy delivery (which is oh so important!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Yes the screen has a little bit of bleeding around the edges but I only ever see this when it loads up on it's black background, after that the screen looks amazing, It's fast and snappy but the build quality lacks a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: J. Barlow

customer_reviews.title: with great features. Compared to the Nexus 7 (2012) I ...
customer_reviews.text: Timely delivery by Amazon UK. Nexus upgraded the OS automatically over an hour or two. Fast machine, with great features. Compared to the Nexus 7 (2012) I had, it does not show any sign of becoming overwhelmed by resource needs from the lollipop or marshmallow versions.
customer_reviews.author: JEAN-FRANCOIS LE TENO

customer_reviews.title: ... 2 major problems 2GB of RAM made this tablet useless very quickly
customer_reviews.text: There are 2 major problems 2GB of RAM made this tablet useless very quickly. It is too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Dom and Xu

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in good packaging, but beware that after you've fully charged ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good packaging , but beware that after you've fully charged the device , prepare to allow for a day for it to update the operating system , which it will do several times , and will need many prompts during the processes.
customer_reviews.author: Chuds

customer_reviews.title: Still great!
customer_reviews.text: Best tablet I have ever had, bought 2 since thinking I was upgrading and sold them as they were not as good by far.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 21 months
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this tablet until it died. Now it won't charge, turn on, boot to download or recovery mode. The only thing left to do is crack it open and destroy the internal storage.
customer_reviews.author: Kha

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Superb tablet. Absolutely love it! The battery is great and the screen is a brilliant size to watch videos on. Debated for a long time about buying one and I'm glad I went for the Nexus 9 :)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Iddles

customer_reviews.title: this has broken down on first day i had it maybe it got damaged in the post
customer_reviews.text: this has broken down on first day i had it maybe it got damaged in the post, is there a way of resetting it?
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Am I glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Overwhelmed by the thing! Am I glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Howard Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Greate tablet. Fast and most up to date system ...
customer_reviews.text: Greate tablet. Fast and most up to date system on the market. Only negative is, it can get hot around the camera when playing games or heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: D. T. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Totally excellent product. Due to my work I constantly use ...
customer_reviews.text: Totally excellent product. Due to my work I constantly use a selection of the top tablets/ipads on the market and the HTC google nexus 9 is at the top of the stack.
customer_reviews.author: regharper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: its working like dream, has everything I need and fits in my handbag
customer_reviews.author: Treacle

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate.
customer_reviews.text: What a bargain! Great price, arrived quickly, works perfectly. Job done. Many thanks. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: David Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Very fast, reliable and no lag, battery takes a while to charge though
customer_reviews.author: Scott21

customer_reviews.title: great tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant tablet, does everything I need it for. Very quick on all apps etc.
customer_reviews.author: Shanu Ali

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviews critique the Nexus 9 and how good it is. I think that this was when the device was initially launched and cost nearer to £300. At £207 (black), this device is very good value. It's a nice piece of equipment, which I will shortly wrap in a case, Very fast, good screen, seems to be very good battery life (although when I transferred all my applications from my phone, it was kept quite busy and the battery drained quite quickly)! Certainly good for the day + regardless.... Nice size, bigger than my previous 8inch Samsung. Reasonable note taking via Microsoft OneNote. More convenient size to carry around than 10inch + tablets
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: It's Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet, fast, slim, light, but the build quality on mine wasn't the best, a bit creaky and some unwanted light bleed. Come on google/HTC, you can do better. Also, I do think 64gb storage and micro SD card support should be standard by now... But blame Apple for other companies copying the non sd card format. The battery lasted a good while and the screen is fantastic. The camera, well it was ok I guess, for a tablet, I never consider the camera on a tablet either way, as phones have much better ones.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper2005

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional...
customer_reviews.text: Obviously some concerns over initial build quality, light bleed etc etc... but I have no complaints about this item at all. Exceptional performance, astonishingly good video quality, exceptional reception when using either WiFi or 4G and since Android 5.0.2 was released many of the initial Lollipop bugs have been ironed out. Still awaiting on 5.1.1 for the LTE version but I have 100% confidence this will only improve this exceptional piece of hardware even further. I can only thoroughly recommend this item, particularly if you are looking for pure and unadulterated Android.
customer_reviews.author: Optimus Prime

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tablet to replaced my ipad, Apple products are just too clamped down and what you can and can't do. This android tablet is free to customise as I wish! There are lots of updates once you receive you turn it on and it took a long time to install them all. Now it has the tablet is very fast, battery is ok, but has nothing on the ipad battery which lasts forever! However this product makes up for the battery life in every other aspect.
customer_reviews.author: J. Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: The best Nexus Table that has been made to date and ...
customer_reviews.text: The best Nexus Table that has been made to date and with strong build quality, excellent display and sound and long lasting battery. A true iPad alternative
customer_reviews.author: SCL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet - an ideal upgrade from early generations
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tablet - it is so much faster than previous generations - and the size is ideal for web browsing/reading.Battery life is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: An excellent tablet - the Nexus experience is really good
customer_reviews.text: An excellent tablet - the Nexus experience is really good, much better than a previous Samsung tablet. Also I got the Marshmallow update just a few days after it was released.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Craig

customer_reviews.title: better than the iPad by far.
customer_reviews.text: Not used the iPad since I picked this up, love it.
customer_reviews.author: nick stevenson

customer_reviews.title: That tablet is just amazing..
customer_reviews.text: That tablet is just amazing...I'm very happy with this product although im having real problems with the lack of sd card...Be sure that you dont need an sd before you buy...For me is very important but I took my changes
customer_reviews.author: Bill Zidis

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The Nexus 9 is fantastic; excellent screen, runs smooth as butter and is pleasure to behold... which is why it's such a shame the tablet I received suffered from awful light bleeding at the top of the device, a widely known issue with the Nexus 9. I personally couldn't live with it, so I decided to get a refund. I just don't think a premium device like this should suffer with such glaring problems like this. It's probably the best Android tablet out right now, completely let down by poor build quality. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: DJI P3A
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use with my DJI Phantom 3 Advanced. It works a treat. This is all I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: spencer pearse

customer_reviews.title: The backlight bleed is just too much to ignore. ...
customer_reviews.text: The backlight bleed is just too much to ignore. At this price point the screen just isn't up to scratch and for a device i mostly plan to use for watching things this is a killer.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good all round tablet
customer_reviews.text: A really capable tablet, it is a nice weight so can easily be held with only one hand something I found slightly uncomfortable after a while with my old Nexus 10. The screen is a beautiful crisp image with very vibrant colours. The front speakers do make for a better listening experience compared to most other tablets. The only thing I would have wished for is QI wireless charging capability and the side buttons being slightly larger making them easier to press.
customer_reviews.author: JEIKOBU

customer_reviews.title: Good but flawed
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my nexus tablet and take extremely good care of it, although from time to time my sound goes awful and I have to simply wait till it sorts itself out.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Mail and Calendar apps (which a like a lot better than Googles apps) but that is ...
customer_reviews.text: Awsome tablet... only downside so far is that Google tries to get everybody to use their apps for everything.. GMail for all mail accounts, Photos for all gallery viewing etc... I tried downloading the HTC Sense Gallery, Mail and Calendar apps (which a like a lot better than Googles apps) but that is not possible since the apps is "not compatible with your device" according to Google Play Store. I find that hard to believe since HTC has manufactured the actual device it would seem plausible that the would be able to make their apps work on the tablet. But other than that it is an awsome tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a couple of months now, and it is very good. It gets a bit hot sometimes, but I believe that is normal, and it seems to happen when the CPU is hammered. A few apps do fail quite often, but are OK on restart. Probably more to do with the apps than the device. Other than that very good screen, good battery life, very light and easy to handle, good user interface.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money -does what it says n the box. Impressive speed and screen
customer_reviews.author: Mr Andrew McClure Scott

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL!
customer_reviews.text: Awful, this device does get hot when using, even light usage. There was also an annoying edge of light around the outside of the screen (google light bleed) this is a common problem with this device. Just don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro1969

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet, especially for the £199 I paid for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet, especially for the £199 I paid for it. Any more and I think is too much to pay for a tablet. Only thing is I'm disappointed with the stock OS, I was planning on flashing custom ROMs after a week or two but in the end did it that same weekend because of it, works even better.
customer_reviews.author: Simeh

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: Having had a nexus 10 I wanted to update, not disappointed, fast tablet, lollipop excellent .
customer_reviews.author: Alan Watt

customer_reviews.title: Nexus 9- device maybe is good in terms of hardware but the problem is
customer_reviews.text: Nexus 9- device maybe is good in terms of hardware but the problem is, it seems to me, Lollipop. Month my device and I seriously disappointed in him, first of all it eats the battery in an insane even during sleep. As long as it crashes and I have to do it Ristrt fixed. I, as a customer and my money, not willing to be a guinea pig. I want to get a proper and fair service now, and not suffer from failures of this or that company.
customer_reviews.author: Brulik

customer_reviews.title: Clunky and not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Kept dropping Wi-Fi connection. Too slow for a modern tablet. Freezes while processor catches up. Returned this as unsuitable and bought a Samsung Galaxy Tab S2 - wonderful machine, worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Soon

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product overall
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product overall, but with a few pet peeves of mine. The sound quality is poor. Not a big problem as I don't use it for such, but it has to be said. The lack of a SD/MicroSD slot for a external memory expansion is pretty much unforgivable as it is quite obvious this was done to force people into choosing between this and the more pricey version with larger internal storage. This alone turns it from a five star into a three star product. Everything else is what is to be expected from a high-end tablet. Good battery life and smooth operation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice tablet..does everything I want...good price for a great product....easy to hold and easy to use...nice clear screen and quick....
customer_reviews.author: Bazzagas

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Responsive, well-built, slick Android tablet. Beautiful high-resolution display. Stereo speakers are great for Netflix and YouTube viewing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great tablet HTC/Google at there Best
customer_reviews.text: I have had many tablets and this is the best so far by far, the size for me is perfect and having 3g/LTE is a great I have always liked HTC and used many of there phones and was please the the same quality's have made it to there tablet. The screen is really very good and very clear the speakers sound good for films and music it amazes me that are fitted in such a thin tablet. Today I have added there Filo Keyboard case and I have to say that now many this tablet a possible laptop replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Alistair A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great resolution, great sound, great quality. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin_Drake

customer_reviews.title: Great device for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Fast, Pure Android, very light and slim. Great battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Bobajob6

customer_reviews.title: I love you Google but..
customer_reviews.text: Poor built quality.. Extremely back light bleeding and defective buttons and back cover even in my 2nd replacement.. Two stars for lollipop which is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Panagiotopoulos

customer_reviews.title: Seemed great at first but every other day it freezes
customer_reviews.text: Seemed great at first but every other day it freezes. Only way to sort it us to leave it until battery runs out. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: zgirl

customer_reviews.title: A very good tablet
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Battery Life Screen Resolution Speed Cons: Gets warm after a lot of YouTube videos I will update
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet, although
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet, although, I think they should stop selling tablets which do not support external storage and are below 32GB in internal storage - not very practical in real life. Battery life is good. Android works great (with just minor bugs every now and then).
customer_reviews.author: sarunas

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tablet shame there was no instruction book as I am a novice
customer_reviews.author: susan horwood

customer_reviews.title: yep, it met my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: just as I thought it would be :) bought Nexus 9 as the replacement for my old GT 10.1 and GT2 7.0 - and I'm very happy with this purchase. sweet design [it matches my Nexus 5 ;)] fast, and still portable. can recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Piotr Bartkowiak

customer_reviews.title: HTC 9
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for online reading, tether to my phone works great.
customer_reviews.author: P. Pang

customer_reviews.title: Tablet isuch faster than Nexus7 and despite previous reviews, ...
customer_reviews.text: Tablet isuch faster than Nexus7 and despite previous reviews, I had no trouble with light bleed and the power buttons were readily accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good job nexus
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1) came on time 2) battery goes forever 3) always updates first 4)works perfectly without any issues. Well done to nexus Cons: 1) the charging takes too much time(except when using the original charger which then takes just much time) I highly recomend it
customer_reviews.author: Nikolaos K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered on time very easy to use.packaging was very good
customer_reviews.author: C A Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Dora,s Nexus 9
customer_reviews.text: It,s really good once you have learnt how to use it. You need somebody who knows all about the Nexus 9 tpo show you what TO DO AND WHAT IS POSSIBLE. DORA
customer_reviews.author: dora keiditsch

customer_reviews.title: Good bye Apple
customer_reviews.text: Excellent but after so many months it gets very warm and a few times as rebooted without notice. This replaced an iPad and much more value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PLEASED WITH MY PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with this tablet. The back light when reading an eBook sometimes fades though.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Shirley Collins

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Battery life and time to re-charge is really disappointing; beside that it is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandro

customer_reviews.title: Defo a market leader
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Tablet size and feel, does the job. Good display and speed
customer_reviews.author: Qamar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nexus 9 is excellent. I always shop with Amazon, especially for electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.LindaBarlow

customer_reviews.title: Good clear screen
customer_reviews.text: In stock when I needed it at a reasonable price. Good clear screen and easier to read than my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Everitt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant tablet. Perfect size, running stock android, great design, excellent screen. What else can be said?
customer_reviews.author: Mas

customer_reviews.title: Battery charger problem
customer_reviews.text: Battery charger has problem. Takes 7hrs to fully charge battery with a 60% remaining status.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Tan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For £200 it is an amazing value. A good quality tablet
customer_reviews.author: Sachin Kanekar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the Nexus but I'd like the option of the smaller 7 inch too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant tablet that does was it says on the tin.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: second time lucky
customer_reviews.text: I was one of the first to get the LTE version in the UK which was terrifically exciting until I had to send it back due to a problem with the screen and the sim port. The new one arrived quickly and appears a thus far to be free from the same defects. Strictly speaking the orientation in which the instructions tell you to put the sim card in are wrong by the way, so anyone getting one, don't worry that it isn't as it the pictures, the clipped corner of the sim is towards the charger port of the tablet. (Not that it would actually fit the way the instructions suggest)
customer_reviews.author: Someoneorother

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing featured and smooth touch are the best qualities of HTC Nexus 9 tablet..
customer_reviews.author: Pinali Vijaicant

customer_reviews.title: Really good... But I am watching it very closely
customer_reviews.text: Initial response is very, very positive Researched this a lot, and I mean a lot... The one I was sent appears to be one of the 'new breed' and the problems with the volume and power buttons have been solved. I have no flex (white model) and a very, very small amount of bleed The tablet is quick, and with optimisations, will only get quicker... so overall I am very pleased so far However I will be watching for problems and I will have no hesitation sending it back if I have any concerns (and it does get hot... But living in Northern Scotland we will take whatever heat we can get ;-) )
customer_reviews.author: Giles Gilham

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: I would avoid this product. I don't know if the issue the hardware or if it's something in android that just isn't quite right with this new 64bit processor but this thing stutters like way too much. If you don't care about the occasional hiccup, pausing and waiting from a nexus device the price is good but that's just it, a nexus device shouldn't be priced like a clearance device. Just save yourself a huge headache and avoid it.
customer_reviews.author: R. HINES

customer_reviews.title: nexus tablet
customer_reviews.text: Loving this tablet. My last nexus tablet was smaller than this one and I thought this might feel a bit big but I am really liking the larger screen. A good all round tablet which suits me completely.
customer_reviews.author: J.N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tablet
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy into the negative reviews you see on the net, this device is superb. Build quality is nice, light bleed on my device is no worse than any other LCD panel (con of the technology I'm afraid) ie. not visible unless in a completely dark room and you go looking for it, the size is perfect for general browsing and reading and to top it off, Android 5.0 is simply amazing with this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: but some games like Clash of Clans are not smooth
customer_reviews.text: came in broken - battery charge takes about 18 hours. It is very expensive, but some games like Clash of Clans are not smooth. Ipad mini 2 plays that game smooth and it is a very old tablet, while this one is new, broken, expensive and SLOW. If you are playing games - forget about android, better get IPAD - it is times faster, less problematic and works charming.
customer_reviews.author: Kalin B.

customer_reviews.title: Super Fast Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Fab Product & Seller, Super Fast Delivery, Packaging perfect, Thank You - Highly Recommended! A*
customer_reviews.author: suzanne gould

customer_reviews.title: Bought Nexus 9 after seeing so many good reviews. Although nexus 9 is brighter but the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using nexus 10, for mostly watching videos and playing games. Bought Nexus 9 after seeing so many good reviews. Although nexus 9 is brighter but the contrast is poor compare to the nexus 10 and because of that, the videos feels cold there is not warmth in the display. When I had a go with the Domination game, I noticed the green colour is way too bright, feels artificial. I do not recommend it. I have returned my tablet next day.
customer_reviews.author: king

customer_reviews.title: Very good tablet this
customer_reviews.text: Very good tablet this, worth every penny. Although I feel the galaxy tab is better, I have never invested in many things better than this little beast. As a student this is a very convenient and user friendkddy tab
customer_reviews.author: Muhammed Patel

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all the family
customer_reviews.text: The tablet had a dead pixel and had to be returned at my expense along with photographic proof and a written statement. Fun for all the family.
customer_reviews.author: Twain32

customer_reviews.title: Great if you don't pay over £350 for it
customer_reviews.text: The Nexus 9 still has some pretty bad performance issues to date with Android 5.1.1. Google still needs to properly optimise Android for 64-bit SoCs. Hopefully Android M will be the answer. Otherwise the screen is fantastic, the speakers are OK and the battery is OK. It runs hot but at least the build quality is the best you can get for a tablet. An iPad would probably serve you better right now.
customer_reviews.author: Fil Sapia

customer_reviews.title: pleased
customer_reviews.text: Arrived 3 days early!!! Seems solidly made and very responsive, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers,screen and os
customer_reviews.text: Runs great! , no lag - No floppy back - no light bleed but also no mhl :(
customer_reviews.author: markg

customer_reviews.title: Hot!!! But can also become hot...
customer_reviews.text: I think it's a petty cool tablet but it does become fairy hot fairly quickly
customer_reviews.author: Jordon Scott-Tyler

customer_reviews.title: More lightbleeding that properly working screen... 3 times!
customer_reviews.text: Even though I love HTC and Android, I bought this tablet and have already gotten a third replacement with no success. All of them show huge amount of lightbleeding which is disappointing for a 500EUR tablet. This is highly noticeable when watching films as the screen borders turn black. Three times... Been almost a month that I don't get to enjoy a device. Now the Amazon support recommends me to refund and not return the device... Quite disappointing experience overall. If you're one of the lucky people who bought this and got no lightbleeding, enjoy it as its a great device itself. However, out of 3 I got none of them with less than 50% of the screen bleeding...
customer_reviews.author: Und

customer_reviews.title: Great software. Dodgy hardware.
customer_reviews.text: In hardware terms this thing is not a patch on my 2013 iPad air. The speakers are good however. The battery life is not brilliant. I had to receive 3 units before I got one with decent buttons on the top right. There is a general clunkiness when navigating around. The Android 5.1.1 OS is the only real saving grace. I bought at £210. Not worth more in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: nice tablet. I'm into Android so suits me. Shame it doesnt have wireless charging like the Nexus 5 phone.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I am  sure I will like this when I find my way around.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first tablet .There isn't a manuel to download so I am haveing to ask around friends and Googleing for information.
customer_reviews.author: Cheetacat  Puss

product_meta.title: HTC 8.9 inch Nexus 9 Tablet - (White) (ARM 2.5GHz, 2GB RAM, 16GB Memory, Wi-Fi, Android v5.0)
feature_bullets: Nexus 9 with clean lines, a brushed metal body and soft grip back
Front-facing stereo speakers with HTC's BoomSound make sound immersive, layered, and distortion-free
The 64-bit processor has all the power of a desktop so you can check email, watch a video, play a game, and tweak a doc
With Nexus 9, you're the first to get the latest Android updates from Google, so you can enjoy the latest features and enhancements
Up to 9.5 hours battery life. 8-megapixel rear facing camera
